About Me

Hello, I am Ace, a Computer Engineer with a diverse background in hardware, networks, software development, and data analytics.


I focus on building strong, efficient systems and making them run smoothly. I enjoy tackling complex problems and finding innovative solutions that enhance performance and reliability. Whether it's optimizing existing infrastructure or developing new applications, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality results that exceed expectations.

With a passion for technology, I thrive in fast-paced environments and am always looking for new challenges to expand my expertise. I believe in continuous learning, constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

Out here you'll find me indulging in my love for reading, savoring a good cup of coffee, and spending play time with my babies (cats & dogs).

My Skills

Proficient in multiple programming languages, front-end and back-end development, and database management. Experienced with SDLC, agile methodologies, and version control. Knowledgeable in networking, operating systems, computer architecture, cybersecurity, and mobile development. Skilled with various development tools and software.

My Projects

Explore my projects to learn more about what I do.

element-ary - Web Component Editor

element-ary is a zero-code web component maker for beginner web developers, designed to make every and all web components in an unlimited number of styles and presets.

Web Application

PeriodCheck

Introducing PeriodCheck, a project designed to empower women and help them track their monthly cycle. With this innovative tool, women can stay continuously informed about their period, making it easier to manage their health and well-being. PeriodCheck is the perfect solution for anyone looking for a convenient and reliable way to track their monthly period.

Mobile Application

NASA - Duplicate Website

The NASA - Duplicate Website project is a web development exercise that demonstrates the ability to create and structure website components with precision. This project showcases the near exact recreation of the live NASA website, serving as a valuable tool for honing skills in web development.

Web Design
